title: Tsolga
text:
Tsolga () is a <a href="types%20of%20inhabited%20localities%20in%20Russia">rural locality</a> (an <a href="Village%23Russia">ulus</a>) in <a href="Mukhorshibirsky%20District">Mukhorshibirsky District</a>, <a href="Republic%20of%20Buryatia">Republic of Buryatia</a>, Russia. The population was 737 as of 2010. There are 19 streets.
Geography.
Tsolga is located 46 km west of <a href="Mukhorshibir">Mukhorshibir</a> (the district's administrative centre) by road. Balta is the nearest rural locality.
